name: TokenPocket
description: TokenPocket is the world's leading multi-chain self-custodial wallet and supports EVM-compatible networks such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, and Ethereum Layer2, as well as non-EVM-compatible networks like Bitcoin, TRON, Solana, and Dogecoin. The Recovery Phrase and Private Key are stored in the userâ€™s own device and the user can fully control his own crypto assets.
